channel.title: Emote Tab
channel.description:
Where would i change the emote tab buttons on like what they do
As in where they teleport you and junk.

item.title: Emote Tab
item.dc:creator: @Limit101 Limit101
item.description:
@Limit101 wrote:

O i see thanks but i just figured it out. But yeah client.java is what i like needed lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Emote Tab
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Alright, click an emote you want - and on your run server thing you will perhaps see:

AB: numberHere

(Number will be like 0 - 70000 or what not)

Now, in case 185: in client java, add something for it
If the emote was AB 333, then in case 185 do this

Case 333: sendMessage("When you click the emote, it will send a message!"); teleportToX: teleportToY: openupbank(): break;

You can do many things.

Read full topic
